bind.jr:constraintMsg: VHT visit date can't be more than 30 days ago. Also can't be a future date
Please enter a valid local number, or use the standard international format, which includes a plus sign (+) and country code. For example: +256712345678
Number of items distributed should be more than zero
Number of ICCM sessions conducted should be more than zero
Number of Maternal Health sessions should be more than zero

input.label: Find out how the VHT is doing before continuing with this visit.

select1.label: Is the VHT Available at the time of the visit?
Is the VHT still using the same Contact?

input.label: What is the new Contact Number?

select1.label: Is your device in good working condition?

select.label: What is the condition of the device?

select1.label: Was the stolen device reported?

input.label: Advise the vht to go to the police report and obtain a police letter

select1.label: Are drugs kept in a locked box in a dry place?

input.label: Advise the VHT to ensure that all drugs are stored in a dry place to maintain their effectiveness and prevent damage

select1.label: Are the supplies kept clean and dry?

input.label: Advise the VHT to ensure that all supplies are kept clean and dry to maintain their effectiveness and prevent damage

select1.label: Do you have 6 or more ORS sachets?

input.label: Advise the VHT to go for a refill immediately

select1.label: Do you have 2 or more Zinc blisters?
How many outbreaks have you reported?
How frequently, on a weekly basis, was the mentioned outbreak reported?
How many people are estimated to have been/are affected?
Have there been any rumours around the community?

Was the rumour addressed?

select1.label: How was the rumour addressed?
Did you distribute any items this month?

group.label: How many items were received for distribution?

select1.label: Select Item Type
How many households received items?

input.label: Encourage the VHT to report on things including those just observed

select1.label: How many houses received WASH mentorship sessions?
How was the session given?

How many ICCM sessions were conducted?
